infos.value: It's just as the legends say.
Then the ancient relics reside here...under the castle?
Does something trouble you, Your Highness?
Do you not feel it? The presence of something unnatural...
Yes, I feel it...and strongly, Your Highness.
Whatever awaits us below, it is surely more terrible than any monster we have faced before.
But fear not, Queen Helena. You have my word that no monster will keep us from those ancient relics.
